description: A man with a parrot head. He was formerly a member of a yakuza group and was well-respected among the people. However, he fell in love with the wife of his boss. He would occasionally say very cool things which usually makes http://anidb.net/ch15161 [Kou] and http://anidb.net/ch15162 [Hoshi] scream "aniki".
name: Billy
